--   SiteWise Monitor portal. You can use the alarm to monitor an asset
--   property and get notified when the asset property value is outside a

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetRelationshipSummary

-- | Contains information about assets that are related to one another.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetRelationshipSummary</a> smart constructor.
data AssetRelationshipSummary
AssetRelationshipSummary' :: Maybe AssetHierarchyInfo -> AssetRelationshipType -> AssetRelationshipSummary

-- | The assets that are related through an asset hierarchy.
--   
--   This object is present if the <tt>relationshipType</tt> is
--   <tt>HIERARCHY</tt>.
[$sel:hierarchyInfo:AssetRelationshipSummary'] :: AssetRelationshipSummary -> Maybe AssetHierarchyInfo

-- | The relationship type of the assets in this relationship. This value
--   is one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>HIERARCHY</tt> – The assets are related through an asset
--   hierarchy. If you specify this relationship type, this asset
--   relationship includes the <tt>hierarchyInfo</tt> object.</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:relationshipType:AssetRelationshipSummary'] :: AssetRelationshipSummary -> AssetRelationshipType

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetRelationshipSummary</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:hierarchyInfo:AssetRelationshipSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assetRelationshipSummary_hierarchyInfo</a> - The assets that are
--   related through an asset hierarchy.
--   
--   This object is present if the <tt>relationshipType</tt> is
--   <tt>HIERARCHY</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:relationshipType:AssetRelationshipSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assetRelationshipSummary_relationshipType</a> - The relationship
--   type of the assets in this relationship. This value is one of the
--   following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>HIERARCHY</tt> – The assets are related through an asset
--   hierarchy. If you specify this relationship type, this asset
--   relationship includes the <tt>hierarchyInfo</tt> object.</li>
--   </ul>
newAssetRelationshipSummary :: AssetRelationshipType -> AssetRelationshipSummary

-- | The assets that are related through an asset hierarchy.
--   
--   This object is present if the <tt>relationshipType</tt> is
--   <tt>HIERARCHY</tt>.
assetRelationshipSummary_hierarchyInfo :: Lens' AssetRelationshipSummary (Maybe AssetHierarchyInfo)

-- | The relationship type of the assets in this relationship. This value
--   is one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>HIERARCHY</tt> – The assets are related through an asset
--   hierarchy. If you specify this relationship type, this asset
--   relationship includes the <tt>hierarchyInfo</tt> object.</li>
--   </ul>
assetRelationshipSummary_relationshipType :: Lens' AssetRelationshipSummary AssetRelationshipType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetRelationshipSummary.AssetRelationshipSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetRelationshipSummary.AssetRelationshipSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetRelationshipSummary.AssetRelationshipSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetRelationshipSummary.AssetRelationshipSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetRelationshipSummary.AssetRelationshipSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetRelationshipSummary.AssetRelationshipSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetRelationshipSummary.AssetRelationshipSummary

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute

-- | Contains an asset attribute property. For more information, see
--   <a>Attributes</a> in the <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAttribute</a> smart constructor.
data Attribute
Attribute' :: Maybe Text -> Attribute

-- | The default value of the asset model property attribute. All assets
--   that you create from the asset model contain this attribute value. You
--   can update an attribute's value after you create an asset. For more
--   information, see <a>Updating attribute values</a> in the <i>IoT
--   SiteWise User Guide</i>.
[$sel:defaultValue:Attribute'] :: Attribute -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Attribute</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultValue:Attribute'</a>, <a>attribute_defaultValue</a> -
--   The default value of the asset model property attribute. All assets
--   that you create from the asset model contain this attribute value. You
--   can update an attribute's value after you create an asset. For more
--   information, see <a>Updating attribute values</a> in the <i>IoT
--   SiteWise User Guide</i>.
newAttribute :: Attribute

-- | The default value of the asset model property attribute. All assets
--   that you create from the asset model contain this attribute value. You
--   can update an attribute's value after you create an asset. For more
--   information, see <a>Updating attribute values</a> in the <i>IoT
--   SiteWise User Guide</i>.
attribute_defaultValue :: Lens' Attribute (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute.Attribute
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Attribute.Attribute

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage

-- | Contains information about a customer managed Amazon S3 bucket.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCustomerManagedS3Storage</a> smart constructor.
data CustomerManagedS3Storage
CustomerManagedS3Storage' :: Text -> Text -> CustomerManagedS3Storage

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the Amazon S3 object. For more information about how
--   to find the ARN for an Amazon S3 object, see <a>Amazon S3
--   resources</a> in the <i>Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide</i>.
[$sel:s3ResourceArn:CustomerManagedS3Storage'] :: CustomerManagedS3Storage -> Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the Identity and Access Management role that allows
--   IoT SiteWise to send data to Amazon S3.
[$sel:roleArn:CustomerManagedS3Storage'] :: CustomerManagedS3Storage -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CustomerManagedS3Storage</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:s3ResourceArn:CustomerManagedS3Storage'</a>,
--   <a>customerManagedS3Storage_s3ResourceArn</a> - The <a>ARN</a> of the
--   Amazon S3 object. For more information about how to find the ARN for
--   an Amazon S3 object, see <a>Amazon S3 resources</a> in the <i>Amazon
--   Simple Storage Service User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:CustomerManagedS3Storage'</a>,
--   <a>customerManagedS3Storage_roleArn</a> - The <a>ARN</a> of the
--   Identity and Access Management role that allows IoT SiteWise to send
--   data to Amazon S3.
newCustomerManagedS3Storage :: Text -> Text -> CustomerManagedS3Storage

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the Amazon S3 object. For more information about how
--   to find the ARN for an Amazon S3 object, see <a>Amazon S3
--   resources</a> in the <i>Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide</i>.
customerManagedS3Storage_s3ResourceArn :: Lens' CustomerManagedS3Storage Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the Identity and Access Management role that allows
--   IoT SiteWise to send data to Amazon S3.
customerManagedS3Storage_roleArn :: Lens' CustomerManagedS3Storage Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage.CustomerManagedS3Storage
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage.CustomerManagedS3Storage
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage.CustomerManagedS3Storage
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage.CustomerManagedS3Storage
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage.CustomerManagedS3Storage
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage.CustomerManagedS3Storage
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage.CustomerManagedS3Storage
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.CustomerManagedS3Storage.CustomerManagedS3Storage


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.DashboardSummary

-- | Contains a dashboard summary.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newDashboardSummary</a> smart constructor.
data DashboardSummary
DashboardSummary' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> DashboardSummary

-- | The date the dashboard was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:lastUpdateDate:DashboardSummary'] :: DashboardSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The date the dashboard was created, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:creationDate:DashboardSummary'] :: DashboardSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The dashboard's description.
[$sel:description:DashboardSummary'] :: DashboardSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the dashboard.
[$sel:id:DashboardSummary'] :: DashboardSummary -> Text

-- | The name of the dashboard
[$sel:name:DashboardSummary'] :: DashboardSummary -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DashboardSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateDate:DashboardSummary'</a>,
--   <a>dashboardSummary_lastUpdateDate</a> - The date the dashboard was
--   last updated, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:DashboardSummary'</a>,
--   <a>dashboardSummary_creationDate</a> - The date the dashboard was
--   created, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:DashboardSummary'</a>,
--   <a>dashboardSummary_description</a> - The dashboard's description.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:DashboardSummary'</a>, <a>dashboardSummary_id</a> - The ID
--   of the dashboard.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:DashboardSummary'</a>, <a>dashboardSummary_name</a> - The
--   name of the dashboard
newDashboardSummary :: Text -> Text -> DashboardSummary

-- | The date the dashboard was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
dashboardSummary_lastUpdateDate :: Lens' DashboardSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The date the dashboard was created, in Unix epoch time.
dashboardSummary_creationDate :: Lens' DashboardSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The dashboard's description.
dashboardSummary_description :: Lens' DashboardSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the dashboard.
dashboardSummary_id :: Lens' DashboardSummary Text

-- | The name of the dashboard
dashboardSummary_name :: Lens' DashboardSummary Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.DashboardSummary.DashboardSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.DashboardSummary.DashboardSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.DashboardSummary.DashboardSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.DashboardSummary.DashboardSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.DashboardSummary.DashboardSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.DashboardSummary.DashboardSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.DashboardSummary.DashboardSummary

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ConfigurationStatus

--

data ConfigurationStatus

[$sel:state:ConfigurationStatus'] :: ConfigurationStatus -> ConfigurationState

--   omitted.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   information, if any.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:ConfigurationStatus'</a>,
--   <a>configurationStatus_state</a> - The current state of the
--   configuration.
newConfigurationStatus :: ConfigurationState -> ConfigurationStatus

-- | Contains associated error information, if any.
configurationStatus_error :: Lens' ConfigurationStatus (Maybe ConfigurationErrorDetails)

-- | The current state of the configuration.
configurationStatus_state :: Lens' ConfigurationStatus ConfigurationState

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ErrorDetails

-- | Contains the details of an IoT SiteWise error.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newErrorDetails</a> smart constructor.
data ErrorDetails
ErrorDetails' :: Maybe [DetailedError] -> ErrorCode -> Text -> ErrorDetails

-- | A list of detailed errors.
[$sel:details:ErrorDetails'] :: ErrorDetails -> Maybe [DetailedError]

-- | The error code.
[$sel:code:ErrorDetails'] :: ErrorDetails -> ErrorCode

-- | The error message.
[$sel:message:ErrorDetails'] :: ErrorDetails -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ErrorDetails</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:details:ErrorDetails'</a>, <a>errorDetails_details</a> - A
--   list of detailed errors.
--   
--   <a>$sel:code:ErrorDetails'</a>, <a>errorDetails_code</a> - The error
--   code.
--   
--   <a>$sel:message:ErrorDetails'</a>, <a>errorDetails_message</a> - The
--   error message.
newErrorDetails :: ErrorCode -> Text -> ErrorDetails

-- | A list of detailed errors.
errorDetails_details :: Lens' ErrorDetails (Maybe [DetailedError])

-- | The error code.
errorDetails_code :: Lens' ErrorDetails ErrorCode

-- | The error message.
errorDetails_message :: Lens' ErrorDetails Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ErrorDetails.ErrorDetails
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ErrorDetails.ErrorDetails

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetStatus

-- | Contains information about the current status of an asset. For more
--   information, see <a>Asset and model states</a> in the <i>IoT SiteWise
--   User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetStatus</a> smart constructor.
data AssetStatus
AssetStatus' :: Maybe ErrorDetails -> AssetState -> AssetStatus

-- | Contains associated error information, if any.
[$sel:error:AssetStatus'] :: AssetStatus -> Maybe ErrorDetails

-- | The current status of the asset.
[$sel:state:AssetStatus'] :: AssetStatus -> AssetState

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetStatus</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:error:AssetStatus'</a>, <a>assetStatus_error</a> - Contains
--   associated error information, if any.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:AssetStatus'</a>, <a>assetStatus_state</a> - The current
--   status of the asset.
newAssetStatus :: AssetState -> AssetStatus

-- | Contains associated error information, if any.
assetStatus_error :: Lens' AssetStatus (Maybe ErrorDetails)

-- | The current status of the asset.
assetStatus_state :: Lens' AssetStatus AssetState
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetStatus.AssetStatus
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetStatus.AssetStatus
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetStatus.AssetStatus
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetStatus.AssetStatus
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetStatus.AssetStatus
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetStatus.AssetStatus
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetStatus.AssetStatus


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssociatedAssetsSummary

-- | Contains a summary of an associated asset.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssociatedAssetsSummary</a> smart constructor.
data AssociatedAssetsSummary
AssociatedAssetsSummary' :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> POSIX -> POSIX -> AssetStatus -> [AssetHierarchy] -> AssociatedAssetsSummary

-- | The ID of the asset.
[$sel:id:AssociatedAssetsSummary'] :: AssociatedAssetsSummary -> Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the asset, which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset/${AssetId}
--   </pre>
[$sel:arn:AssociatedAssetsSummary'] :: AssociatedAssetsSummary -> Text

-- | The name of the asset.
[$sel:name:AssociatedAssetsSummary'] :: AssociatedAssetsSummary -> Text

-- | The ID of the asset model used to create the asset.
[$sel:assetModelId:AssociatedAssetsSummary'] :: AssociatedAssetsSummary -> Text

-- | The date the asset was created, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:creationDate:AssociatedAssetsSummary'] :: AssociatedAssetsSummary -> POSIX

-- | The date the asset was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:lastUpdateDate:AssociatedAssetsSummary'] :: AssociatedAssetsSummary -> POSIX

-- | The current status of the asset.
[$sel:status:AssociatedAssetsSummary'] :: AssociatedAssetsSummary -> AssetStatus

-- | A list of asset hierarchies that each contain a <tt>hierarchyId</tt>.
--   A hierarchy specifies allowed parent/child asset relationships.
[$sel:hierarchies:AssociatedAssetsSummary'] :: AssociatedAssetsSummary -> [AssetHierarchy]

-- | Create a value of <a>AssociatedAssetsSummary</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssociatedAssetsSummary'</a>,
--   <a>associatedAssetsSummary_id</a> - The ID of the asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssociatedAssetsSummary'</a>,
--   <a>associatedAssetsSummary_arn</a> - The <a>ARN</a> of the asset,
--   which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset/${AssetId}
--   </pre>
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssociatedAssetsSummary'</a>,
--   <a>associatedAssetsSummary_name</a> - The name of the asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assetModelId:AssociatedAssetsSummary'</a>,
--   <a>associatedAssetsSummary_assetModelId</a> - The ID of the asset
--   model used to create the asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:AssociatedAssetsSummary'</a>,
--   <a>associatedAssetsSummary_creationDate</a> - The date the asset was
--   created, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateDate:AssociatedAssetsSummary'</a>,
--   <a>associatedAssetsSummary_lastUpdateDate</a> - The date the asset was
--   last updated, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssociatedAssetsSummary'</a>,
--   <a>associatedAssetsSummary_status</a> - The current status of the
--   asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:hierarchies:AssociatedAssetsSummary'</a>,
--   <a>associatedAssetsSummary_hierarchies</a> - A list of asset
--   hierarchies that each contain a <tt>hierarchyId</tt>. A hierarchy
--   specifies allowed parent/child asset relationships.
newAssociatedAssetsSummary :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> AssetStatus -> AssociatedAssetsSummary

-- | The ID of the asset.
associatedAssetsSummary_id :: Lens' AssociatedAssetsSummary Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the asset, which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset/${AssetId}
--   </pre>
associatedAssetsSummary_arn :: Lens' AssociatedAssetsSummary Text

-- | The name of the asset.
associatedAssetsSummary_name :: Lens' AssociatedAssetsSummary Text

-- | The ID of the asset model used to create the asset.
associatedAssetsSummary_assetModelId :: Lens' AssociatedAssetsSummary Text

-- | The date the asset was created, in Unix epoch time.
associatedAssetsSummary_creationDate :: Lens' AssociatedAssetsSummary UTCTime

-- | The date the asset was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
associatedAssetsSummary_lastUpdateDate :: Lens' AssociatedAssetsSummary UTCTime

-- | The current status of the asset.
associatedAssetsSummary_status :: Lens' AssociatedAssetsSummary AssetStatus

-- | A list of asset hierarchies that each contain a <tt>hierarchyId</tt>.
--   A hierarchy specifies allowed parent/child asset relationships.
associatedAssetsSummary_hierarchies :: Lens' AssociatedAssetsSummary [AssetHierarchy]
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssociatedAssetsSummary.AssociatedAssetsSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssociatedAssetsSummary.AssociatedAssetsSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssociatedAssetsSummary.AssociatedAssetsSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssociatedAssetsSummary.AssociatedAssetsSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssociatedAssetsSummary.AssociatedAssetsSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssociatedAssetsSummary.AssociatedAssetsSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssociatedAssetsSummary.AssociatedAssetsSummary


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetSummary

-- | Contains a summary of an asset.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetSummary</a> smart constructor.
data AssetSummary
AssetSummary' :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> POSIX -> POSIX -> AssetStatus -> [AssetHierarchy] -> AssetSummary

-- | The ID of the asset.
[$sel:id:AssetSummary'] :: AssetSummary -> Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the asset, which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset/${AssetId}
--   </pre>
[$sel:arn:AssetSummary'] :: AssetSummary -> Text

-- | The name of the asset.
[$sel:name:AssetSummary'] :: AssetSummary -> Text

-- | The ID of the asset model used to create this asset.
[$sel:assetModelId:AssetSummary'] :: AssetSummary -> Text

-- | The date the asset was created, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:creationDate:AssetSummary'] :: AssetSummary -> POSIX

-- | The date the asset was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:lastUpdateDate:AssetSummary'] :: AssetSummary -> POSIX

-- | The current status of the asset.
[$sel:status:AssetSummary'] :: AssetSummary -> AssetStatus

-- | A list of asset hierarchies that each contain a <tt>hierarchyId</tt>.
--   A hierarchy specifies allowed parent/child asset relationships.
[$sel:hierarchies:AssetSummary'] :: AssetSummary -> [AssetHierarchy]

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssetSummary'</a>, <a>assetSummary_id</a> - The ID of the
--   asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssetSummary'</a>, <a>assetSummary_arn</a> - The
--   <a>ARN</a> of the asset, which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset/${AssetId}
--   </pre>
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssetSummary'</a>, <a>assetSummary_name</a> - The name of
--   the asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:assetModelId:AssetSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assetSummary_assetModelId</a> - The ID of the asset model used to
--   create this asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:AssetSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assetSummary_creationDate</a> - The date the asset was created, in
--   Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateDate:AssetSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assetSummary_lastUpdateDate</a> - The date the asset was last
--   updated, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssetSummary'</a>, <a>assetSummary_status</a> - The
--   current status of the asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:hierarchies:AssetSummary'</a>, <a>assetSummary_hierarchies</a>
--   - A list of asset hierarchies that each contain a
--   <tt>hierarchyId</tt>. A hierarchy specifies allowed parent/child asset
--   relationships.
newAssetSummary :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> AssetStatus -> AssetSummary

-- | The ID of the asset.
assetSummary_id :: Lens' AssetSummary Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the asset, which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset/${AssetId}
--   </pre>
assetSummary_arn :: Lens' AssetSummary Text

-- | The name of the asset.
assetSummary_name :: Lens' AssetSummary Text

-- | The ID of the asset model used to create this asset.
assetSummary_assetModelId :: Lens' AssetSummary Text

-- | The date the asset was created, in Unix epoch time.
assetSummary_creationDate :: Lens' AssetSummary UTCTime

-- | The date the asset was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
assetSummary_lastUpdateDate :: Lens' AssetSummary UTCTime

-- | The current status of the asset.
assetSummary_status :: Lens' AssetSummary AssetStatus

-- | A list of asset hierarchies that each contain a <tt>hierarchyId</tt>.
--   A hierarchy specifies allowed parent/child asset relationships.
assetSummary_hierarchies :: Lens' AssetSummary [AssetHierarchy]
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetSummary.AssetSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetSummary.AssetSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetSummary.AssetSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetSummary.AssetSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetSummary.AssetSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetSummary.AssetSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetSummary.AssetSummary


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelStatus

-- | Contains current status information for an asset model. For more
--   information, see <a>Asset and model states</a> in the <i>IoT SiteWise
--   User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetModelStatus</a> smart constructor.
data AssetModelStatus
AssetModelStatus' :: Maybe ErrorDetails -> AssetModelState -> AssetModelStatus

-- | Contains associated error information, if any.
[$sel:error:AssetModelStatus'] :: AssetModelStatus -> Maybe ErrorDetails

-- | The current state of the asset model.
[$sel:state:AssetModelStatus'] :: AssetModelStatus -> AssetModelState

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetModelStatus</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:error:AssetModelStatus'</a>, <a>assetModelStatus_error</a> -
--   Contains associated error information, if any.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:AssetModelStatus'</a>, <a>assetModelStatus_state</a> -
--   The current state of the asset model.
newAssetModelStatus :: AssetModelState -> AssetModelStatus

-- | Contains associated error information, if any.
assetModelStatus_error :: Lens' AssetModelStatus (Maybe ErrorDetails)

-- | The current state of the asset model.
assetModelStatus_state :: Lens' AssetModelStatus AssetModelState
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelStatus.AssetModelStatus
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelStatus.AssetModelStatus
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelStatus.AssetModelStatus
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelStatus.AssetModelStatus
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelStatus.AssetModelStatus
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelStatus.AssetModelStatus
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelStatus.AssetModelStatus


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetModelSummary

-- | Contains a summary of an asset model.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetModelSummary</a> smart constructor.
data AssetModelSummary
AssetModelSummary' :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> POSIX -> POSIX -> AssetModelStatus -> AssetModelSummary

-- | The ID of the asset model (used with IoT SiteWise APIs).
[$sel:id:AssetModelSummary'] :: AssetModelSummary -> Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the asset model, which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset-model/${AssetModelId}
--   </pre>
[$sel:arn:AssetModelSummary'] :: AssetModelSummary -> Text

-- | The name of the asset model.
[$sel:name:AssetModelSummary'] :: AssetModelSummary -> Text

-- | The asset model description.
[$sel:description:AssetModelSummary'] :: AssetModelSummary -> Text

-- | The date the asset model was created, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:creationDate:AssetModelSummary'] :: AssetModelSummary -> POSIX

-- | The date the asset model was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:lastUpdateDate:AssetModelSummary'] :: AssetModelSummary -> POSIX

-- | The current status of the asset model.
[$sel:status:AssetModelSummary'] :: AssetModelSummary -> AssetModelStatus

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetModelSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssetModelSummary'</a>, <a>assetModelSummary_id</a> - The
--   ID of the asset model (used with IoT SiteWise APIs).
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:AssetModelSummary'</a>, <a>assetModelSummary_arn</a> - The
--   <a>ARN</a> of the asset model, which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset-model/${AssetModelId}
--   </pre>
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssetModelSummary'</a>, <a>assetModelSummary_name</a> -
--   The name of the asset model.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssetModelSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assetModelSummary_description</a> - The asset model description.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:AssetModelSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assetModelSummary_creationDate</a> - The date the asset model was
--   created, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateDate:AssetModelSummary'</a>,
--   <a>assetModelSummary_lastUpdateDate</a> - The date the asset model was
--   last updated, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:AssetModelSummary'</a>, <a>assetModelSummary_status</a>
--   - The current status of the asset model.
newAssetModelSummary :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> AssetModelStatus -> AssetModelSummary

-- | The ID of the asset model (used with IoT SiteWise APIs).
assetModelSummary_id :: Lens' AssetModelSummary Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the asset model, which has the following format.
--   
--   <pre>
--   arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:asset-model/${AssetModelId}
--   </pre>
assetModelSummary_arn :: Lens' AssetModelSummary Text

-- | The name of the asset model.
assetModelSummary_name :: Lens' AssetModelSummary Text

-- | The asset model description.
assetModelSummary_description :: Lens' AssetModelSummary Text

-- | The date the asset model was created, in Unix epoch time.
assetModelSummary_creationDate :: Lens' AssetModelSummary UTCTime

-- | The date the asset model was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
assetModelSummary_lastUpdateDate :: Lens' AssetModelSummary UTCTime

-- | The current status of the asset model.
assetModelSummary_status :: Lens' AssetModelSummary AssetModelStatus

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayCapabilitySummary

-- | Contains a summary of a gateway capability configuration.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGatewayCapabilitySummary</a> smart constructor.
data GatewayCapabilitySummary
GatewayCapabilitySummary' :: Text -> CapabilitySyncStatus -> GatewayCapabilitySummary

-- | The namespace of the capability configuration. For example, if you
--   configure OPC-UA sources from the IoT SiteWise console, your OPC-UA
--   capability configuration has the namespace
--   <tt>iotsitewise:opcuacollector:version</tt>, where <tt>version</tt> is
--   a number such as <tt>1</tt>.
[$sel:capabilityNamespace:GatewayCapabilitySummary'] :: GatewayCapabilitySummary -> Text

-- | The synchronization status of the capability configuration. The sync
--   status can be one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>IN_SYNC</tt> – The gateway is running the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   <li><tt>OUT_OF_SYNC</tt> – The gateway hasn't received the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   <li><tt>SYNC_FAILED</tt> – The gateway rejected the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:capabilitySyncStatus:GatewayCapabilitySummary'] :: GatewayCapabilitySummary -> CapabilitySyncStatus

-- | Create a value of <a>GatewayCapabilitySummary</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:capabilityNamespace:GatewayCapabilitySummary'</a>,
--   <a>gatewayCapabilitySummary_capabilityNamespace</a> - The namespace of
--   the capability configuration. For example, if you configure OPC-UA
--   sources from the IoT SiteWise console, your OPC-UA capability
--   configuration has the namespace
--   <tt>iotsitewise:opcuacollector:version</tt>, where <tt>version</tt> is
--   a number such as <tt>1</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:capabilitySyncStatus:GatewayCapabilitySummary'</a>,
--   <a>gatewayCapabilitySummary_capabilitySyncStatus</a> - The
--   synchronization status of the capability configuration. The sync
--   status can be one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>IN_SYNC</tt> – The gateway is running the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   <li><tt>OUT_OF_SYNC</tt> – The gateway hasn't received the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   <li><tt>SYNC_FAILED</tt> – The gateway rejected the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   </ul>
newGatewayCapabilitySummary :: Text -> CapabilitySyncStatus -> GatewayCapabilitySummary

-- | The namespace of the capability configuration. For example, if you
--   configure OPC-UA sources from the IoT SiteWise console, your OPC-UA
--   capability configuration has the namespace
--   <tt>iotsitewise:opcuacollector:version</tt>, where <tt>version</tt> is
--   a number such as <tt>1</tt>.
gatewayCapabilitySummary_capabilityNamespace :: Lens' GatewayCapabilitySummary Text

-- | The synchronization status of the capability configuration. The sync
--   status can be one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>IN_SYNC</tt> – The gateway is running the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   <li><tt>OUT_OF_SYNC</tt> – The gateway hasn't received the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   <li><tt>SYNC_FAILED</tt> – The gateway rejected the capability
--   configuration.</li>
--   </ul>
gatewayCapabilitySummary_capabilitySyncStatus :: Lens' GatewayCapabilitySummary CapabilitySyncStatus
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayCapabilitySummary.GatewayCapabilitySummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayCapabilitySummary.GatewayCapabilitySummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayCapabilitySummary.GatewayCapabilitySummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayCapabilitySummary.GatewayCapabilitySummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayCapabilitySummary.GatewayCapabilitySummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayCapabilitySummary.GatewayCapabilitySummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayCapabilitySummary.GatewayCapabilitySummary


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass

-- | Contains details for a gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass. To create
--   a gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass, you must add the IoT SiteWise
--   connector to a Greengrass group and deploy it. Your Greengrass group
--   must also have permissions to upload data to IoT SiteWise. For more
--   information, see <a>Ingesting data using a gateway</a> in the <i>IoT
--   SiteWise User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGreengrass</a> smart constructor.
data Greengrass
Greengrass' :: Text -> Greengrass

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the Greengrass group. For more information about how
--   to find a group's ARN, see <a>ListGroups</a> and <a>GetGroup</a> in
--   the <i>IoT Greengrass API Reference</i>.
[$sel:groupArn:Greengrass'] :: Greengrass -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Greengrass</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:groupArn:Greengrass'</a>, <a>greengrass_groupArn</a> - The
--   <a>ARN</a> of the Greengrass group. For more information about how to
--   find a group's ARN, see <a>ListGroups</a> and <a>GetGroup</a> in the
--   <i>IoT Greengrass API Reference</i>.
newGreengrass :: Text -> Greengrass

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the Greengrass group. For more information about how
--   to find a group's ARN, see <a>ListGroups</a> and <a>GetGroup</a> in
--   the <i>IoT Greengrass API Reference</i>.
greengrass_groupArn :: Lens' Greengrass Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass.Greengrass
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass.Greengrass
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass.Greengrass
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass.Greengrass
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass.Greengrass
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass.Greengrass
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass.Greengrass
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Greengrass.Greengrass


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2

-- | Contains details for a gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass V2. To
--   create a gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass V2, you must deploy the
--   IoT SiteWise Edge component to your gateway device. Your <a>Greengrass
--   device role</a> must use the <tt>AWSIoTSiteWiseEdgeAccess</tt> policy.
--   For more information, see <a>Using IoT SiteWise at the edge</a> in the
--   <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGreengrassV2</a> smart constructor.
data GreengrassV2
GreengrassV2' :: Text -> GreengrassV2

-- | The name of the IoT thing for your IoT Greengrass V2 core device.
[$sel:coreDeviceThingName:GreengrassV2'] :: GreengrassV2 -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>GreengrassV2</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:coreDeviceThingName:GreengrassV2'</a>,
--   <a>greengrassV2_coreDeviceThingName</a> - The name of the IoT thing
--   for your IoT Greengrass V2 core device.
newGreengrassV2 :: Text -> GreengrassV2

-- | The name of the IoT thing for your IoT Greengrass V2 core device.
greengrassV2_coreDeviceThingName :: Lens' GreengrassV2 Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2.GreengrassV2
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2.GreengrassV2
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2.GreengrassV2
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2.GreengrassV2
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2.GreengrassV2
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2.GreengrassV2
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2.GreengrassV2
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GreengrassV2.GreengrassV2


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform

-- | Contains a gateway's platform information.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGatewayPlatform</a> smart constructor.
data GatewayPlatform
GatewayPlatform' :: Maybe Greengrass -> Maybe GreengrassV2 -> GatewayPlatform

-- | A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass.
[$sel:greengrass:GatewayPlatform'] :: GatewayPlatform -> Maybe Greengrass

-- | A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass V2.
[$sel:greengrassV2:GatewayPlatform'] :: GatewayPlatform -> Maybe GreengrassV2

-- | Create a value of <a>GatewayPlatform</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:greengrass:GatewayPlatform'</a>,
--   <a>gatewayPlatform_greengrass</a> - A gateway that runs on IoT
--   Greengrass.
--   
--   <a>$sel:greengrassV2:GatewayPlatform'</a>,
--   <a>gatewayPlatform_greengrassV2</a> - A gateway that runs on IoT
--   Greengrass V2.
newGatewayPlatform :: GatewayPlatform

-- | A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass.
gatewayPlatform_greengrass :: Lens' GatewayPlatform (Maybe Greengrass)

-- | A gateway that runs on IoT Greengrass V2.
gatewayPlatform_greengrassV2 :: Lens' GatewayPlatform (Maybe GreengrassV2)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform.GatewayPlatform
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform.GatewayPlatform
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform.GatewayPlatform
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform.GatewayPlatform
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform.GatewayPlatform
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform.GatewayPlatform
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform.GatewayPlatform
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewayPlatform.GatewayPlatform


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewaySummary

-- | Contains a summary of a gateway.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newGatewaySummary</a> smart constructor.
data GatewaySummary
GatewaySummary' :: Maybe GatewayPlatform -> Maybe [GatewayCapabilitySummary] -> Text -> Text -> POSIX -> POSIX -> GatewaySummary
[$sel:gatewayPlatform:GatewaySummary'] :: GatewaySummary -> Maybe GatewayPlatform

-- | A list of gateway capability summaries that each contain a namespace
--   and status. Each gateway capability defines data sources for the
--   gateway. To retrieve a capability configuration's definition, use
--   <a>DescribeGatewayCapabilityConfiguration</a>.
[$sel:gatewayCapabilitySummaries:GatewaySummary'] :: GatewaySummary -> Maybe [GatewayCapabilitySummary]

-- | The ID of the gateway device.
[$sel:gatewayId:GatewaySummary'] :: GatewaySummary -> Text

-- | The name of the asset.
[$sel:gatewayName:GatewaySummary'] :: GatewaySummary -> Text

-- | The date the gateway was created, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:creationDate:GatewaySummary'] :: GatewaySummary -> POSIX

-- | The date the gateway was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:lastUpdateDate:GatewaySummary'] :: GatewaySummary -> POSIX

-- | Create a value of <a>GatewaySummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:gatewayPlatform:GatewaySummary'</a>,
--   <a>gatewaySummary_gatewayPlatform</a> - Undocumented member.
--   
--   <a>$sel:gatewayCapabilitySummaries:GatewaySummary'</a>,
--   <a>gatewaySummary_gatewayCapabilitySummaries</a> - A list of gateway
--   capability summaries that each contain a namespace and status. Each
--   gateway capability defines data sources for the gateway. To retrieve a
--   capability configuration's definition, use
--   <a>DescribeGatewayCapabilityConfiguration</a>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:gatewayId:GatewaySummary'</a>, <a>gatewaySummary_gatewayId</a>
--   - The ID of the gateway device.
--   
--   <a>$sel:gatewayName:GatewaySummary'</a>,
--   <a>gatewaySummary_gatewayName</a> - The name of the asset.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:GatewaySummary'</a>,
--   <a>gatewaySummary_creationDate</a> - The date the gateway was created,
--   in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateDate:GatewaySummary'</a>,
--   <a>gatewaySummary_lastUpdateDate</a> - The date the gateway was last
--   updated, in Unix epoch time.
newGatewaySummary :: Text -> Text -> UTCTime -> UTCTime -> GatewaySummary

-- | Undocumented member.
gatewaySummary_gatewayPlatform :: Lens' GatewaySummary (Maybe GatewayPlatform)

-- | A list of gateway capability summaries that each contain a namespace
--   and status. Each gateway capability defines data sources for the
--   gateway. To retrieve a capability configuration's definition, use
--   <a>DescribeGatewayCapabilityConfiguration</a>.
gatewaySummary_gatewayCapabilitySummaries :: Lens' GatewaySummary (Maybe [GatewayCapabilitySummary])

-- | The ID of the gateway device.
gatewaySummary_gatewayId :: Lens' GatewaySummary Text

-- | The name of the asset.
gatewaySummary_gatewayName :: Lens' GatewaySummary Text

-- | The date the gateway was created, in Unix epoch time.
gatewaySummary_creationDate :: Lens' GatewaySummary UTCTime

-- | The date the gateway was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
gatewaySummary_lastUpdateDate :: Lens' GatewaySummary UTCTime
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewaySummary.GatewaySummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewaySummary.GatewaySummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewaySummary.GatewaySummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewaySummary.GatewaySummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewaySummary.GatewaySummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewaySummary.GatewaySummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.GatewaySummary.GatewaySummary

--   the <i>IAM User Guide</i>.
--   
--   If you delete the IAM user, access policies that contain this identity

--   include an empty <tt>arn</tt>. You can delete the access policy for
--   the IAM user that no longer exists.

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageFile

-- | Contains an image file.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newImageFile</a> smart constructor.
data ImageFile
ImageFile' :: Base64 -> ImageFileType -> ImageFile

-- | The image file contents, represented as a base64-encoded string. The
--   file size must be less than 1 MB.
[$sel:data':ImageFile'] :: ImageFile -> Base64

-- | The file type of the image.
[$sel:type':ImageFile'] :: ImageFile -> ImageFileType

-- | Create a value of <a>ImageFile</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:data':ImageFile'</a>, <a>imageFile_data</a> - The image file
--   contents, represented as a base64-encoded string. The file size must
--   be less than 1 MB.-- -- <i>Note:</i> This <tt>Lens</tt> automatically
--   encodes and decodes Base64 data. -- The underlying isomorphism will
--   encode to Base64 representation during -- serialisation, and decode
--   from Base64 representation during deserialisation. -- This
--   <tt>Lens</tt> accepts and returns only raw unencoded data.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':ImageFile'</a>, <a>imageFile_type</a> - The file type of
--   the image.
newImageFile :: ByteString -> ImageFileType -> ImageFile

-- | The image file contents, represented as a base64-encoded string. The
--   file size must be less than 1 MB.-- -- <i>Note:</i> This <tt>Lens</tt>
--   automatically encodes and decodes Base64 data. -- The underlying
--   isomorphism will encode to Base64 representation during --
--   serialisation, and decode from Base64 representation during
--   deserialisation. -- This <tt>Lens</tt> accepts and returns only raw
--   unencoded data.
imageFile_data :: Lens' ImageFile ByteString

-- | The file type of the image.
imageFile_type :: Lens' ImageFile ImageFileType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageFile.ImageFile
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageFile.ImageFile
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageFile.ImageFile
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageFile.ImageFile
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageFile.ImageFile
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageFile.ImageFile
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageFile.ImageFile


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Image

-- | Contains an image that is one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>An image file. Choose this option to upload a new image.</li>
--   <li>The ID of an existing image. Choose this option to keep an
--   existing image.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newImage</a> smart constructor.
data Image
Image' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe ImageFile -> Image

-- | The ID of an existing image. Specify this parameter to keep an
--   existing image.
[$sel:id:Image'] :: Image -> Maybe Text
[$sel:file:Image'] :: Image -> Maybe ImageFile

-- | Create a value of <a>Image</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Image'</a>, <a>image_id</a> - The ID of an existing image.
--   Specify this parameter to keep an existing image.
--   
--   <a>$sel:file:Image'</a>, <a>image_file</a> - Undocumented member.
newImage :: Image

-- | The ID of an existing image. Specify this parameter to keep an
--   existing image.
image_id :: Lens' Image (Maybe Text)

-- | Undocumented member.
image_file :: Lens' Image (Maybe ImageFile)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Image.Image
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Image.Image
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Image.Image
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Image.Image
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Image.Image
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Image.Image
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Image.Image


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageLocation

-- | Contains an image that is uploaded to IoT SiteWise and available at a
--   URL.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newImageLocation</a> smart constructor.
data ImageLocation
ImageLocation' :: Text -> Text -> ImageLocation

-- | The ID of the image.
[$sel:id:ImageLocation'] :: ImageLocation -> Text

-- | The URL where the image is available. The URL is valid for 15 minutes
--   so that you can view and download the image
[$sel:url:ImageLocation'] :: ImageLocation -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ImageLocation</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ImageLocation'</a>, <a>imageLocation_id</a> - The ID of the
--   image.
--   
--   <a>$sel:url:ImageLocation'</a>, <a>imageLocation_url</a> - The URL
--   where the image is available. The URL is valid for 15 minutes so that
--   you can view and download the image
newImageLocation :: Text -> Text -> ImageLocation

-- | The ID of the image.
imageLocation_id :: Lens' ImageLocation Text

-- | The URL where the image is available. The URL is valid for 15 minutes
--   so that you can view and download the image
imageLocation_url :: Lens' ImageLocation Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageLocation.ImageLocation
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageLocation.ImageLocation
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ImageLocation.ImageLocation

--   the cloud.

--   configuration for the given measurement property.

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Measurement

-- | Contains an asset measurement property. For more information, see
--   <a>Measurements</a> in the <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newMeasurement</a> smart constructor.
data Measurement
Measurement' :: Maybe MeasurementProcessingConfig -> Measurement

-- | The processing configuration for the given measurement property. You
--   can configure measurements to be kept at the edge or forwarded to the
--   Amazon Web Services Cloud. By default, measurements are forwarded to
--   the cloud.
[$sel:processingConfig:Measurement'] :: Measurement -> Maybe MeasurementProcessingConfig

-- | Create a value of <a>Measurement</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:processingConfig:Measurement'</a>,
--   <a>measurement_processingConfig</a> - The processing configuration for
--   the given measurement property. You can configure measurements to be
--   kept at the edge or forwarded to the Amazon Web Services Cloud. By
--   default, measurements are forwarded to the cloud.
newMeasurement :: Measurement

-- | The processing configuration for the given measurement property. You
--   can configure measurements to be kept at the edge or forwarded to the
--   Amazon Web Services Cloud. By default, measurements are forwarded to
--   the cloud.
measurement_processingConfig :: Lens' Measurement (Maybe MeasurementProcessingConfig)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Measurement.Measurement
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Measurement.Measurement

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalStatus

--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPortalStatus</a> smart constructor.

-- | Contains associated error information, if any.
[$sel:error:PortalStatus'] :: PortalStatus -> Maybe MonitorErrorDetails

-- | The current state of the portal.
[$sel:state:PortalStatus'] :: PortalStatus -> PortalState

-- | Create a value of <a>PortalStatus</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--

--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:error:PortalStatus'</a>, <a>portalStatus_error</a> - Contains
--   associated error information, if any.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:PortalStatus'</a>, <a>portalStatus_state</a> - The
--   current state of the portal.
newPortalStatus :: PortalState -> PortalStatus

-- | Contains associated error information, if any.
portalStatus_error :: Lens' PortalStatus (Maybe MonitorErrorDetails)

-- | The current state of the portal.
portalStatus_state :: Lens' PortalStatus PortalState
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalStatus.PortalStatus
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalStatus.PortalStatus

instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalStatus.PortalStatus


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalSummary

-- | Contains a portal summary.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPortalSummary</a> smart constructor.
data PortalSummary
PortalSummary' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> PortalStatus -> PortalSummary

-- | The date the portal was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:lastUpdateDate:PortalSummary'] :: PortalSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The date the portal was created, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:creationDate:PortalSummary'] :: PortalSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The portal's description.
[$sel:description:PortalSummary'] :: PortalSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the service role that allows the portal's users to
--   access your IoT SiteWise resources on your behalf. For more
--   information, see <a>Using service roles for IoT SiteWise Monitor</a>
--   in the <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
[$sel:roleArn:PortalSummary'] :: PortalSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the portal.
[$sel:id:PortalSummary'] :: PortalSummary -> Text

-- | The name of the portal.
[$sel:name:PortalSummary'] :: PortalSummary -> Text

-- | The URL for the IoT SiteWise Monitor portal. You can use this URL to
--   access portals that use Amazon Web Services SSO for authentication.
--   For portals that use IAM for authentication, you must use the IoT
--   SiteWise console to get a URL that you can use to access the portal.
[$sel:startUrl:PortalSummary'] :: PortalSummary -> Text
[$sel:status:PortalSummary'] :: PortalSummary -> PortalStatus

-- | Create a value of <a>PortalSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateDate:PortalSummary'</a>,
--   <a>portalSummary_lastUpdateDate</a> - The date the portal was last
--   updated, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:PortalSummary'</a>,
--   <a>portalSummary_creationDate</a> - The date the portal was created,
--   in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:PortalSummary'</a>,
--   <a>portalSummary_description</a> - The portal's description.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:PortalSummary'</a>, <a>portalSummary_roleArn</a> - The
--   <a>ARN</a> of the service role that allows the portal's users to
--   access your IoT SiteWise resources on your behalf. For more
--   information, see <a>Using service roles for IoT SiteWise Monitor</a>
--   in the <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:PortalSummary'</a>, <a>portalSummary_id</a> - The ID of the
--   portal.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:PortalSummary'</a>, <a>portalSummary_name</a> - The name
--   of the portal.
--   
--   <a>$sel:startUrl:PortalSummary'</a>, <a>portalSummary_startUrl</a> -
--   The URL for the IoT SiteWise Monitor portal. You can use this URL to
--   access portals that use Amazon Web Services SSO for authentication.
--   For portals that use IAM for authentication, you must use the IoT
--   SiteWise console to get a URL that you can use to access the portal.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:PortalSummary'</a>, <a>portalSummary_status</a> -
--   Undocumented member.
newPortalSummary :: Text -> Text -> Text -> PortalStatus -> PortalSummary

-- | The date the portal was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
portalSummary_lastUpdateDate :: Lens' PortalSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The date the portal was created, in Unix epoch time.
portalSummary_creationDate :: Lens' PortalSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The portal's description.
portalSummary_description :: Lens' PortalSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The <a>ARN</a> of the service role that allows the portal's users to
--   access your IoT SiteWise resources on your behalf. For more
--   information, see <a>Using service roles for IoT SiteWise Monitor</a>
--   in the <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
portalSummary_roleArn :: Lens' PortalSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the portal.
portalSummary_id :: Lens' PortalSummary Text

-- | The name of the portal.
portalSummary_name :: Lens' PortalSummary Text

-- | The URL for the IoT SiteWise Monitor portal. You can use this URL to
--   access portals that use Amazon Web Services SSO for authentication.
--   For portals that use IAM for authentication, you must use the IoT
--   SiteWise console to get a URL that you can use to access the portal.
portalSummary_startUrl :: Lens' PortalSummary Text

-- | Undocumented member.
portalSummary_status :: Lens' PortalSummary PortalStatus
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalSummary.PortalSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalSummary.PortalSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalSummary.PortalSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalSummary.PortalSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalSummary.PortalSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalSummary.PortalSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PortalSummary.PortalSummary

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ProjectSummary

-- | Contains project summary information.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newProjectSummary</a> smart constructor.
data ProjectSummary
ProjectSummary' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> ProjectSummary

-- | The date the project was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:lastUpdateDate:ProjectSummary'] :: ProjectSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The date the project was created, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:creationDate:ProjectSummary'] :: ProjectSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The project's description.
[$sel:description:ProjectSummary'] :: ProjectSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the project.
[$sel:id:ProjectSummary'] :: ProjectSummary -> Text

-- | The name of the project.
[$sel:name:ProjectSummary'] :: ProjectSummary -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ProjectSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateDate:ProjectSummary'</a>,
--   <a>projectSummary_lastUpdateDate</a> - The date the project was last
--   updated, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationDate:ProjectSummary'</a>,
--   <a>projectSummary_creationDate</a> - The date the project was created,
--   in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ProjectSummary'</a>,
--   <a>projectSummary_description</a> - The project's description.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ProjectSummary'</a>, <a>projectSummary_id</a> - The ID of
--   the project.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ProjectSummary'</a>, <a>projectSummary_name</a> - The
--   name of the project.
newProjectSummary :: Text -> Text -> ProjectSummary

-- | The date the project was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
projectSummary_lastUpdateDate :: Lens' ProjectSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The date the project was created, in Unix epoch time.
projectSummary_creationDate :: Lens' ProjectSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The project's description.
projectSummary_description :: Lens' ProjectSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the project.
projectSummary_id :: Lens' ProjectSummary Text

-- | The name of the project.
projectSummary_name :: Lens' ProjectSummary Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ProjectSummary.ProjectSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ProjectSummary.ProjectSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ProjectSummary.ProjectSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ProjectSummary.ProjectSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ProjectSummary.ProjectSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ProjectSummary.ProjectSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.ProjectSummary.ProjectSummary

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PropertyNotification

-- | Contains asset property value notification information. When the
--   notification state is enabled, IoT SiteWise publishes property value
--   updates to a unique MQTT topic. For more information, see
--   <a>Interacting with other services</a> in the <i>IoT SiteWise User
--   Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPropertyNotification</a> smart constructor.
data PropertyNotification
PropertyNotification' :: Text -> PropertyNotificationState -> PropertyNotification

-- | The MQTT topic to which IoT SiteWise publishes property value update
--   notifications.
[$sel:topic:PropertyNotification'] :: PropertyNotification -> Text

-- | The current notification state.
[$sel:state:PropertyNotification'] :: PropertyNotification -> PropertyNotificationState

-- | Create a value of <a>PropertyNotification</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:topic:PropertyNotification'</a>,
--   <a>propertyNotification_topic</a> - The MQTT topic to which IoT
--   SiteWise publishes property value update notifications.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:PropertyNotification'</a>,
--   <a>propertyNotification_state</a> - The current notification state.
newPropertyNotification :: Text -> PropertyNotificationState -> PropertyNotification

-- | The MQTT topic to which IoT SiteWise publishes property value update
--   notifications.
propertyNotification_topic :: Lens' PropertyNotification Text

-- | The current notification state.
propertyNotification_state :: Lens' PropertyNotification PropertyNotificationState
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PropertyNotification.PropertyNotification
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PropertyNotification.PropertyNotification
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PropertyNotification.PropertyNotification
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PropertyNotification.PropertyNotification
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PropertyNotification.PropertyNotification
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PropertyNotification.PropertyNotification
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.PropertyNotification.PropertyNotification


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetProperty

-- | Contains asset property information.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetProperty</a> smart constructor.
data AssetProperty
AssetProperty' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe PropertyNotification -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> PropertyDataType -> AssetProperty

-- | The data type of the structure for this property. This parameter
--   exists on properties that have the <tt>STRUCT</tt> data type.
[$sel:dataTypeSpec:AssetProperty'] :: AssetProperty -> Maybe Text

-- | The asset property's notification topic and state. For more
--   information, see <a>UpdateAssetProperty</a>.
[$sel:notification:AssetProperty'] :: AssetProperty -> Maybe PropertyNotification

-- | The alias that identifies the property, such as an OPC-UA server data
--   stream path (for example,
--   <tt>/company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature</tt>). For more
--   information, see <a>Mapping industrial data streams to asset
--   properties</a> in the <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
[$sel:alias:AssetProperty'] :: AssetProperty -> Maybe Text

-- | The unit (such as <tt>Newtons</tt> or <tt>RPM</tt>) of the asset
--   property.
[$sel:unit:AssetProperty'] :: AssetProperty -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the asset property.
[$sel:id:AssetProperty'] :: AssetProperty -> Text

-- | The name of the property.
[$sel:name:AssetProperty'] :: AssetProperty -> Text

-- | The data type of the asset property.
[$sel:dataType:AssetProperty'] :: AssetProperty -> PropertyDataType

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetProperty</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataTypeSpec:AssetProperty'</a>,
--   <a>assetProperty_dataTypeSpec</a> - The data type of the structure for
--   this property. This parameter exists on properties that have the
--   <tt>STRUCT</tt> data type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:notification:AssetProperty'</a>,
--   <a>assetProperty_notification</a> - The asset property's notification
--   topic and state. For more information, see <a>UpdateAssetProperty</a>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:alias:AssetProperty'</a>, <a>assetProperty_alias</a> - The
--   alias that identifies the property, such as an OPC-UA server data
--   stream path (for example,
--   <tt>/company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature</tt>). For more
--   information, see <a>Mapping industrial data streams to asset
--   properties</a> in the <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:unit:AssetProperty'</a>, <a>assetProperty_unit</a> - The unit
--   (such as <tt>Newtons</tt> or <tt>RPM</tt>) of the asset property.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:AssetProperty'</a>, <a>assetProperty_id</a> - The ID of the
--   asset property.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssetProperty'</a>, <a>assetProperty_name</a> - The name
--   of the property.
--   
--   <a>$sel:dataType:AssetProperty'</a>, <a>assetProperty_dataType</a> -
--   The data type of the asset property.
newAssetProperty :: Text -> Text -> PropertyDataType -> AssetProperty

-- | The data type of the structure for this property. This parameter
--   exists on properties that have the <tt>STRUCT</tt> data type.
assetProperty_dataTypeSpec :: Lens' AssetProperty (Maybe Text)

-- | The asset property's notification topic and state. For more
--   information, see <a>UpdateAssetProperty</a>.
assetProperty_notification :: Lens' AssetProperty (Maybe PropertyNotification)

-- | The alias that identifies the property, such as an OPC-UA server data
--   stream path (for example,
--   <tt>/company/windfarm/3/turbine/7/temperature</tt>). For more
--   information, see <a>Mapping industrial data streams to asset
--   properties</a> in the <i>IoT SiteWise User Guide</i>.
assetProperty_alias :: Lens' AssetProperty (Maybe Text)

-- | The unit (such as <tt>Newtons</tt> or <tt>RPM</tt>) of the asset
--   property.
assetProperty_unit :: Lens' AssetProperty (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the asset property.
assetProperty_id :: Lens' AssetProperty Text

-- | The name of the property.
assetProperty_name :: Lens' AssetProperty Text

-- | The data type of the asset property.
assetProperty_dataType :: Lens' AssetProperty PropertyDataType
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetProperty.AssetProperty
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetProperty.AssetProperty
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetProperty.AssetProperty
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetProperty.AssetProperty
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetProperty.AssetProperty
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetProperty.AssetProperty
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetProperty.AssetProperty


module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetCompositeModel

-- | Contains information about a composite model in an asset. This object
--   contains the asset's properties that you define in the composite
--   model.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAssetCompositeModel</a> smart constructor.
data AssetCompositeModel
AssetCompositeModel' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> Text -> [AssetProperty] -> AssetCompositeModel

-- | The description of the composite model.
[$sel:description:AssetCompositeModel'] :: AssetCompositeModel -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the composite model.
[$sel:name:AssetCompositeModel'] :: AssetCompositeModel -> Text

-- | The type of the composite model. For alarm composite models, this type
--   is <tt>AWS/ALARM</tt>.
[$sel:type':AssetCompositeModel'] :: AssetCompositeModel -> Text

-- | The asset properties that this composite model defines.
[$sel:properties:AssetCompositeModel'] :: AssetCompositeModel -> [AssetProperty]

-- | Create a value of <a>AssetCompositeModel</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:AssetCompositeModel'</a>,
--   <a>assetCompositeModel_description</a> - The description of the
--   composite model.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:AssetCompositeModel'</a>, <a>assetCompositeModel_name</a>
--   - The name of the composite model.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':AssetCompositeModel'</a>,
--   <a>assetCompositeModel_type</a> - The type of the composite model. For
--   alarm composite models, this type is <tt>AWS/ALARM</tt>.
--   
--   <a>$sel:properties:AssetCompositeModel'</a>,
--   <a>assetCompositeModel_properties</a> - The asset properties that this
--   composite model defines.
newAssetCompositeModel :: Text -> Text -> AssetCompositeModel

-- | The description of the composite model.
assetCompositeModel_description :: Lens' AssetCompositeModel (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the composite model.
assetCompositeModel_name :: Lens' AssetCompositeModel Text

-- | The type of the composite model. For alarm composite models, this type
--   is <tt>AWS/ALARM</tt>.
assetCompositeModel_type :: Lens' AssetCompositeModel Text

-- | The asset properties that this composite model defines.
assetCompositeModel_properties :: Lens' AssetCompositeModel [AssetProperty]
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetCompositeModel.AssetCompositeModel
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetCompositeModel.AssetCompositeModel
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetCompositeModel.AssetCompositeModel
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetCompositeModel.AssetCompositeModel
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetCompositeModel.AssetCompositeModel
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetCompositeModel.AssetCompositeModel
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AssetCompositeModel.AssetCompositeModel

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AggregatedValue

-- | Contains aggregated asset property values (for example, average,
--   minimum, and maximum).
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAggregatedValue</a> smart constructor.
data AggregatedValue
AggregatedValue' :: Maybe Quality -> POSIX -> Aggregates -> AggregatedValue

-- | The quality of the aggregated data.
[$sel:quality:AggregatedValue'] :: AggregatedValue -> Maybe Quality

-- | The date the aggregating computations occurred, in Unix epoch time.
[$sel:timestamp:AggregatedValue'] :: AggregatedValue -> POSIX

-- | The value of the aggregates.
[$sel:value:AggregatedValue'] :: AggregatedValue -> Aggregates

-- | Create a value of <a>AggregatedValue</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:quality:AggregatedValue'</a>, <a>aggregatedValue_quality</a> -
--   The quality of the aggregated data.
--   
--   <a>$sel:timestamp:AggregatedValue'</a>,
--   <a>aggregatedValue_timestamp</a> - The date the aggregating
--   computations occurred, in Unix epoch time.
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:AggregatedValue'</a>, <a>aggregatedValue_value</a> - The
--   value of the aggregates.
newAggregatedValue :: UTCTime -> Aggregates -> AggregatedValue

-- | The quality of the aggregated data.
aggregatedValue_quality :: Lens' AggregatedValue (Maybe Quality)

-- | The date the aggregating computations occurred, in Unix epoch time.
aggregatedValue_timestamp :: Lens' AggregatedValue UTCTime

-- | The value of the aggregates.
aggregatedValue_value :: Lens' AggregatedValue Aggregates
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AggregatedValue.AggregatedValue
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AggregatedValue.AggregatedValue
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.AggregatedValue.AggregatedValue

module Network.AWS.IoTSiteWise.Types.Resource

-- | Contains an IoT SiteWise Monitor resource ID for a portal or project.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResource</a> smart constructor.

Resource' :: Maybe PortalResource -> Maybe ProjectResource -> Resource

-- | A project resource.
[$sel:project:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe ProjectResource

--   fields.

--   resource.

--   <a>$sel:project:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_project</a> - A project
--   resource.

-- | A project resource.
